divs: sighting detailspulled into my mother in laws driveway about 6:30 pm, i got my son out of his car seat and was holding him in my arms. he looked up and said "airplane" i looked up and saw an object flying low directly above us. i said to my mother in law look at that. it looks weird. she said ohyeah it does. we started to walk up her front walk i was behind her and my son and i kept looking up at the object. i stopped and stood still to watch for a moment. i observed the object was diamond shaped, had a white light on 3 of its points a blinking red light in the center and the 4th point was glowing orange, as if it were an interior light illuminating the whole point and bright enough to see a distinct diamond solid shape. i turned to go inside and my mother in law handed me a bag of rock salt for her driveway. it was covered in packed snow\ice. i stopped to watch the object again and realized it was completely quiet. it was at the same height of what the local helicopters fly and no noise. i watched it until it went behind the trees and house across the street. it flew low, and slow in a straight line to the west. towards jeanette.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Greensburg
There were no other sightings in Greensburg on or around January 9th 2013
Summary: low, slow flying diamond shape. a white light on 3 points 4th point glowed from interior light orange
